f(x) = (sin^3(x-pi)*(x-pi)^2 + 3cos^3(x - pi) + 4.5)/(9pi)

integral result = -((-0.75*x**2 + 4.71239*x - 5.9022)*cos(x) + (0.0833333*x**2 - 0.523599*x + 0.803949)*cos(3*x) - 4.5*x + 1.5*x*sin(x) - 0.0555556*x*sin(3*x) - 2.46239*sin(x) + 0.424533*sin(3*x))/(9*pi)
